name: gotron-ui
description: Golang & Electron Boilerplate for Platform Independent Desktop Apps
author: equanox

scripts.install: npm run install:ui:js && npm run install:ui:react && npm run install:ui:typescript && npm run install:ui:vue
scripts.clean: del-cli -f js/node_modules && del-cli -f react/node_modules && del-cli -f typescript/node_modules && del-cli -f typescript/src/*.css.d.ts && del-cli -f vue/node_modules && del-cli -f node_modules || exit 0
scripts.postbuild:js: cpy js/build/*.js build/js/ && echo "Build Ui {js}, cp bundle.js to build/bundle.js"
scripts.postbuild:react: cpy react/build/*.js build/js/ && echo Build Ui {react}, cp bundle.js to build/bundle.js
scripts.postbuild:typescript: cpy typescript/build/*.js build/js/ && echo Build Ui {typescript}, cp bundle.js to build/bundle.js
scripts.postbuild:vue: cpy vue/build/*.js build/js/ && echo Build Ui {vue}, cp bundle.js to build/bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run build:react && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:vue
